Ingredients and Materials:
Bacon, 2 strips
3 Eggs
Shredded Cheese
Olive Oil
Tofu, 1 block
Almond Parmesean
2 Tbsp hummus
2 large cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp nutritional yeast
Salt and black pepper
1/4 tsp paprika
1 tsp cornstarch or arrowroot powder
Zuchinni
Squash
Medium Pan
Plate covered with paper towels
Food processor
Tongs
Bowl and fork
Plastic spatula
Recipie:
Set stove burner to medium heat (5)
Place bacon in pan
Pour olive oil and minced garlic into the pan. Cook untill golden brown.
Cook for 5 min
Transfer garlic to food processor, along with tofu and cornstarch and mix to combine
Remove bacon to plate with paper towel with tongs
Slice zuchinni and squash
Fry zuchinni and squash in bacon grease
Cube zuchinni and squash
Add zuchinni and squash to omlette batter
Crack eggs into bowl and beat with fork
Pour beaten eggs into pan
Add batter to pan, cook for 7 minutes
Add vegtables and cheese
Add almond parmesean to taste
Fold onto plate and Serve
